name: 克里斯蒂亚娜 ‧德‧布奥恩
name_full: 克里斯蒂亚娜 ‧德‧布奥恩 Christanne de Bruijn
introduction:
"Christanne de Bruijn was born in Tilburg on August 16, 1986 and is a Dutch singer and musical actress.

Education
Christanne had a love for the theater at a young age. In 2009 she graduated from the conservatory in Tilburg in the Music Theater study program.

Career progress
Christanne de Bruijn played during her study in the musical productions Rent, Nine and Kiss of your Sister.

After completing her studies, Christanne will perform the Golden Lion Hunting in 2010 in the music theater performance and Richard III in the Stadsschouwburg in Amsterdam. The latter went into revival in 2011 and 2012 due to great success. In addition to this theater work, Christanne worked as a singer at Muziektheatergroep Circus Treurdier.

The first musical role of Christanne was in the hit musical Wicked, in which she plays the role of the handicapped Nessarose Thropp. Since February 2013, Christanne plays the role of Maria Roberta in the musical Sister Act. In June 2014, Christanne played Grace once in the graduation performance Broers by Terence van der Loo and Jeroen Dekkers."
